entry.title: WIND WARNING , Taber
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:14 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vauxhall AAFC 09:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: 4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: NNW 41 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind west 70 km/h gusting to 100 diminishing to 50 gusting to 70 this morning then to 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:43 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Flurries beginning after midnight. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:43 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:43 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
